https://tmrev.io/movie/311478-Cruise Greece 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Without cash or time, traveling to Greece may not be the easiest vacation to organize, but this documentary offers the next best thing -- a virtual vacation right into the heart of the Greek Isles. Cruise the Mediterranean waters and discover a vibrant world filled with history and grandeur. There'll be no seasickness here, as mesmerizing images of a land that balances the ancient and the modern flit onscreen for a trip to remember. Cruise Greece
